sentences.en: Amand：And can yon give me CIF price for Mexico also?
sentences.cn: 阿曼达：那么您能同时给我们报墨西哥到岸价吗?

sentences.en: Can you quote a CIF Bangkok price for me ?
sentences.cn: 能报曼谷的到岸价 吗 ?

sentences.en: Here is our offer, 300 Euro per ton, CIF Singapore.
sentences.cn: 我们的报盘，每吨300欧元新加坡到岸价。

sentences.en: I'd like to have your lowest quotation CIF London.
sentences.cn: 我想知道您的最低伦敦港到岸价.

sentences.en: I'd like to have your lowest quotation CIF New York.
sentences.cn: 请你报贵方CIF纽约最低价.

sentences.en: INTRSTD 350 MT CHEMICAL FERTILIZER PROMT SHPMT PLS QUOT CIF SHANGHAI TKS.
sentences.cn: 我们有兴趣订购350公吨化肥,要求即装,请报cif上海价.谢谢.

sentences.en: Let's close the deal at $ 0.43 per yard, CIF Boston.
sentences.cn: 我们按波士顿港到岸价每码0.43美元成交.

sentences.en: OK. Let's choose the deal at 300 dollars per set CIF New York.
sentences.cn: 好吧. 让我们以纽约到岸价格每台300元成交.

sentences.en: Our offer is New York CIF. Will you please tell us your unloading port, please?
sentences.cn: 我们报的是纽约港的到岸价，你能告诉我们你们的卸货港吗？

sentences.en: Please find enclosed our current catalogue and price - list quoting CIF New York.
sentences.cn: 随函附上我方最新的产品目录及cif纽约报价单.

sentences.en: Please quote 5000 mt black beans CIF Venezuelan Port.
sentences.cn: 请报5000公吨黑豆的价格,CIF委内瑞拉港.

sentences.en: Please send us your best CIF quotation for micro wave ovens.
sentences.cn: 请报给我们微波炉最优惠的CIF价格.

sentences.en: Please send us your best CIF quotation for sewing machines.
sentences.cn: 请报出贵方缝纫机的CIF最低价.

sentences.en: The CIF term requires the seller to clear the goods for export.
sentences.cn: CIF术语要求卖方办理货物出口清关手续.

sentences.en: This is our offer for 10 000 pieces of table cloth at US CIF New York.
sentences.cn: 这是我公司的报盘,一万块台布,每块5美圆,CIF( 到岸价)纽约.

sentences.en: This is our official offer for each item, CIF Shanghai.
sentences.cn: 这是我方对每项产品的CIF上海的正式报价.

sentences.en: We have quoted them the price CIF Hamburg for our Shirting.
sentences.cn: 我方已将印花细布的CIF汉堡价报给他们.

sentences.en: We shall effect the insurance of the goods for 110% of their CIF value.
sentences.cn: 我方将按照货物到岸价金额的110%对这批货物进行投保。

sentences.en: Yes, CIF Ho Chi Minh City.
sentences.cn: 是的, 到胡志明市的到岸价格.

trans.tran_cn: Cost，Insurance and Freight 到岸价格
